server-url.Name: Server Url
server-url.Hint: The URL on which Ethereal Plane Server is running

enabled.Name: Enable Module
enabled.Hint: If this is not checked, the module will not connect to the server

chat-commands-active.Name: Enable Chat Commands
chat-commands-active.Hint: If this is not checked, the module will not run chat commands

send-rolls-to-chat.Name: Send Rolls to Chat
send-rolls-to-chat.Hint: If this is checked, public rolls will be forwarded to stream chat

enable-chat-tab.Name: Chat Tab
enable-chat-tab.Hint: If this is checked, the Chat Tab will be loaded

allow-socket.Name: Allow Sockets
allow-socket.Hint: WARNING! This will allow player clients to send roll messages. This can be exploited to send anything to chat.

allow-api.Name: Allow API Usage
allow-api.Hint: WARNING! This will allow any macro or module to send any messages to chat.

ui.chat-welcome: This is your stream chat! Messages will appear here as they are posted. Reloading the page will clear this.

import.title: Ethereal Plane | Import Data
import.hint1: You are about to import and exported Chat Command configuration.
import.hint2: Data will be appended to the list. Please choose if you want to import Macros as well.
import.data-file-error: You did not import a data file!
import.wrong-file-error: Imported file is not an Ethereal Plane Export

export.title: Ethereal Plane | Export with Buttons?
export.content: Do you want to export the Macros? (Otherwise Macro data will be deleted)

login.hint1: Either press "Open" to open a log-in dialog directly, copy it and send it to another device, or scan the QR code.
login.hint2: This window will automatically close when the login is complete.

ui.title: Title

notifications.api-version-mismatch: API version does not match the installed Module. Please Update. Patreon Features Disabled.
notifications.please-log-in: Please log in to use Ethereal Plane
notifications.invalid-credential: Credentials Invalid, please log in again
notifications.reconnecting: Reconnecting to EP Backend, please wait

strings.youtube-id-hint: Only use this if auto-detection fails
strings.youtube-id-placeholder: Please enter the Video-ID or link of your livestream
strings.disabled: The Module is not enabled. You can configure it, but it won't do anything until you enable it. Some Options are also unavailable
strings.patreon-disconnected: Please connect to a live streaming service above.
strings.account-setup-reminder: Please make sure to set up your account before trying to connect to the backend!
